name: AGAIN!
description:
This is a turn based game prototype with a questionnaire included for a study.

The core is simple:

  • select an action
  • select the enemies to smash
  • get smashed a bit your self
  • repeat

Info for stats within the game

  • Regeneration - health returned per round
  • Armor - decreases damage taken from enemies
  • Pierce - ignores that many armor points on enemies when attacking
  • Attack Count - attacks you can make in a single round
  • Attack - damage you would do to enemies if they had 0 armor
  • Magic Power - strength of you magic ability

music by DST (http://www.nosoapradio.us/)
